header.title: Punks With Lunch, West Oakland CA

content.text: As a volunteer with Punks With Lunch, an Oakland, CA homeless outreach group, I assisted in distributing food, harm reduction supplies, and essential resources to unhoused individuals. We focused on direct aid, advocacy, and community support efforts to address systemic issues affecting the local homeless population.

Helped organize and distribute meals, hygiene kits, and harm reduction supplies to those in need. Worked with other volunteers to establish efficient distribution routes and ensure outreach efforts covered critical areas.

Engaged with unhoused individuals to better understand their needs and advocate for systemic changes. Supported efforts to connect individuals with medical care, housing resources, and local services.
